description:
Please add the following features:
1. Zoom the interface, especially the buttons.
2. Rulers and controls
3. Insert table, pictures, etc.
and many many more features should be added,


I will increase the rating as soon as the product enhances.

UI is amazing, simple, wonderful.

Needs some standard features: auto-sentence case, etc. But the smoothness and simplicity makes this another contender for the "focus-motivated apps for writers" catagory.
